Interactive Parent Course

A comprehensive online program designed to empower you with the knowledge and strategies to support your child's language learning journey with confidence.

What You'll Learn

This course transforms you from overwhelmed to confident, providing a clear roadmap for integrating technology into your child's language learning effectively.

5
Modules
27
Lessons
4.5
Hours
‚àû
Lifetime Access
1

Understanding Language Learning Foundations

Learn the science behind language acquisition and how technology can support natural learning processes.

5 lessons
45 min
How children learn languages The role of input and output Critical periods and windows of opportunity Technology as a learning tool
2

Evaluating Educational Technology

Develop a framework for assessing and selecting appropriate technology tools for your child.

6 lessons
60 min
Quality indicators for educational apps Understanding learning analytics Privacy and safety considerations Free vs. paid resources
3

Creating Effective Learning Routines

Design daily routines that integrate technology meaningfully into your child's language learning journey.

5 lessons
50 min
Balancing screen time Building sustainable habits Parent involvement strategies Tracking progress effectively
4

Interactive Learning Strategies

Master techniques for maximizing engagement and learning outcomes through interactive technology use.

7 lessons
70 min
Co-viewing and co-playing Asking the right questions Extending learning beyond the screen Cultural and contextual awareness
5

Troubleshooting Common Challenges

Address common obstacles and learn solutions for maintaining motivation and progress.

4 lessons
40 min
Overcoming resistance Managing frustration Adjusting difficulty levels When to seek additional support
